name: Little - When my Office is ISEKAI
name_original: Little - When my Office is ISEKAI
description:
"The Game Just Prototype create using Unity Game Engine"

This game is only available in Indonesian.

This game was made to fulfill one of the course assignments in 2020. I developed this game myself by inspired from the game "The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild", "Super Mario Odyssey" and "Genshin Impact".

This game is also an early prototype version, of the game I developed for my Bachelor Degree Thesis.

The assets used were partially created by myself by combining the existing assets below

As for other assets:

  1. Some vector images using assets from Freepik.
  2. Some icon used comes from Iconfinder.
  3. Some assests & music used comes from OpenGameArt.
  4. Some assests & music used comes from Unity Assets Store.

If there are sources of assets not included, you can be submitted via the comments so that I can add them in the future.

- Thanks...
